In the MATTER OF the Termination of the Parent-Child Relationship of J.R.J., SR., Father, and Ja.R.J. and Je.R.J., and Ju.J., Minor Children, J.R.J., Sr., Appellant-Respondent,
v.
Indiana Department of Child Services, Appellee-Petitioner. Court of Appeals Case No. 40A04-1706-JT-1276 Court of Appeals of Indiana. Filed December 20, 2017

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

KIRSCH , J.

Affirmed.

NAJAM, J., Concurs.

BROWN, J., Concurs.
